articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine: Meet COVID-19 ICU nurse Robert Luckey who was 1st to get COVID-19 vaccine in Houston - KTRK-TV
articles.description: Memorial Hermann ICU nurse Robert Luckey was the first in Houston to receive Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine on Tuesday.
